original_text: And all the congregation of Judah, with the priests and the Levites, and all the congregation that came out of Israel, and the strangers that came out of the land of Israel, and that dwelt in Judah, rejoiced.
korean_text: 유다 온 회중과 제사장들과 레위 사람들과 이스라엘에서 온 모든 회중과 이스라엘 땅에서 나온 나그네들과 유다에 사는 나그네들이 다 즐거워하였으므로

sentences.original_text: And all the congregation of Judah
with the priests and the Levites
and all the congregation that came out of Israel
and the strangers that came out of the land of Israel
